description:
The Sherpa Fleece Hoodie is the ultimate garment for the autumn and winter seasons. This hoodie combines warmth, comfort, and technicality to create the perfect go-to piece for any occasion.

Crafted with care, this hoodie is made of 100 % recycled polyester sherpa fleece, ensuring both coziness and sustainability. The innovative Sorbtek® mesh lining is designed to capture moisture, effectively move it away from your body, and release it, keeping you dry and comfortable throughout the day.

With reinforced forearms, shoulders, and hem, you can confidently embrace any adventure knowing that your hoodie can handle it. The YKK® coil zipper guarantees smooth and reliable functionality, making it effortless to put on and take off.

Practicality meets style with two convenient handwarmer pockets, perfect for keeping your hands toasty or storing small essentials. The three-panel hood provides additional coverage and protection from the elements.
name: Hooke Sherpa Fleece Hoodie - Mens
